mutants.code:
from collections import deque
from collections import defaultdict

def calculate_patient_wait_times(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, sickness) = case
        A = [[] for _ in range(1000)]
        for i in range(N):
            A[1000 - sickness[i]] -= [i]
        ans = [0] * N
        t = 1
        for i in range(len(A)):
            for j in A[i]:
                ans[j] = t
                t += 1
        results.append(ans)
    return results

def calculate_patient_wait_times(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, sickness) = case
        A = [[] for _ in range(1000)]
        for i in range(N):
            A[-1000 - sickness[i]] += [i]
        ans = [0] * N
        t = 1
        for i in range(len(A)):
            for j in A[i]:
                ans[j] = t
                t += 1
        results.append(ans)
    return results
